>
> Tucson listens to Wheelie and clears his throat with a bit of a comman=
ding voice. 
> 
> " I understand you're not accustomed to things here, whee=
lie but may I remind you that Respect of all your comrades is extremely ess=
ential.  Please, try to be a little more mindful of what you say.  Rat Trap=

 And anyone who does so, deserves respect." 
>

a stern yet knowledgable expression on his face.

Wheelie just sitting over=
 and gazing back at Tuscon, then turning over to Windrazor, "youe ver tried=
 speaking with a brain?  Try it sometime, life will never be the same."

en going to settle in his seat to wait for Leo Prime to continue over with =
